summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Executive Department Strategic Planning Office; authorizing execution of agreements with the Federal Transit Administration for federal transit grant funding for the Seattle Transit Initiative; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1999 budget for the Executive Department Strategic Planning Office; and accepting funds and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Supplemental Appropriation Account of the Emergency Subfund in connection therewith, all upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
